title: The Cake Taster Table
description: A tiny practice puzzle: four guests, one table, and a very important cake.
clues: Emma and Jack sit together in the middle of the top table.
The cake baker, Lily, wants to be nearest the kitchen at the far left end.
Tom the Best Man takes the far right seat so he can see everyone arrive.
No one else sits at this table.
hints: Start by putting the baker on the far left and the best man on the far right.
If Emma and Jack must sit together in the middle, there’s only one way to place them.
You don’t need to leave any seats empty in this puzzle.
